sentences.en: The writer is guilty of bias and inaccuracy.
sentences.cn: 这位作者失于偏颇，且叙述不实。

sentences.en: He was disturbed by the inaccuracy of the answers.
sentences.cn: 他为答案的不准确性而感到不安。

sentences.en: The report has been rejected by the authorities, who said much of it was based on supposition or inaccuracy.
sentences.cn: 当局驳回了该报告，称其中许多内容来源于主观臆测，并不准确。
